snippet: Kevin Harvick earned his fourth Nationwide Series win of the season with a victory for JR Motorsports at Chicagoland Speedway in Joliet, Ill.
abstract: Kevin Harvick earns his fourth Nationwide Series win of the season with a victory for JR Motorsports at Chicagoland Speedway in Joliet, Ill.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Harvick earned his fourth Nationwide Series win of the season with a victory for JR Motorsports at Chicagoland Speedway in Joliet, Ill.

headline.main: Kevin Harvick Claims Nationwide Race in Illinois
headline.print_headline: Harvick Claims Nationwide Race in Illinois
